abstract: Stock market rises modestly, as Greek debt crisis continues.
lead_paragraph: Investors were waiting for the outcome of new talks among eurozone officials to address Greece’s debt crisis.

headline.main: After a Day of Downs, the Market Makes Modest Gains
headline.print_headline: After a Day of Downs, the Market Makes Modest Gains

snippet: Investors were waiting for the outcome of new talks among eurozone officials to address Greece’s debt crisis.
